document_data.name: The Wet Wizard
document_data.mainbody: '''The Wet Wizard ''' was a tavern in the town of [[Llorkh]] in the 1360s [[DR]].
document_data.History: It opened some time after the [[Zhentarim]] takeover of Llorkh in [[1357 DR]]. Townsfolk were pressed into the construction of two new but ugly taverns. The Wet Wizard was in business by [[1366 DR]] and through [[1370 DR]].
document_data.Description:
The travelogue writer [[Volothamp Geddarm]] presumed it to be a pretty poor place, but hadn't been able to visit to judge.

Lord [[Geildarr]], a mage and ruler of Llorkh, was uncertain if the name "Wet Wizard" was a mocking reference to him or not.
